Job Title: Maintenance Supervisor

Location: Cleveland, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
The Maintenance Supervisor will join a leader in the Manufacturing Industry and be responsible for the installation of new equipment and the repair and maintenance of all Company machinery, buildings, grounds, and utility systems. They will Act as “working foreman,” to perform maintenance work and supervise skilled and non-skilled hourly employees engaged in installation, repair and housekeeping functions.
Maintenance Supervisor Responsibilities: Plan and execute preventive, predictive and corrective maintenance programs, schedule inspections and overhaul equipment. Use MLS software to manage department PM histories and purchases.Oversee the training process of employees on new job assignments.Review technical papers, catalogs and other reference materials and confers with equipment sales representatives to select or recommend new supplies and equipment to improve plant operations.Perform other related duties as assigned. Perform balancer calibrations.Work with outside suppliers and contractors to coordinate completion of projects.Evaluate equipment for suitability to our processes.Requisition and purchase departmental tools, equipment and supplies as required within approved budget. Identify critical items and maintain inventory of spare parts through the tools available in MLS inventory module.Inspect completed work for conformance to specifications.Responsible for maintaining a safe work environment for all employees.Instruct subordinates in safe work practices and enforces plant safety rules.Responsible for maintaining positive employee morale and working within the scope of company contracts and polices and procedures.Monitor all OSHA inspections including crane, lift truck, fire extinguishers, etc.Maintain buildings and grounds in acceptable condition.Review processes and make recommendations for process improvements.Conduct employee training as needed. This could include lock-out/tag-out, forklift, crane and other related topics.
Maintenance Supervisor Requirements: Journey status in a specialized or technical field.5+ years of relevant experience.Supervise skilled hourly maintenance employees as well as employees involved in janitorial and grounds keeping work.Familiar with manufacturing methods.Required to travel to other company facilities, training seminars and equipment suppliers.Limited or incidental access to confidential information, except corporate income and profit figures.Good communication skills, both verbal and written. To excel in the job the employee must be a self starter.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
